name: BbcLearn2Player
short_description:
Are you listening BBC learning english offline while jogging or walking to job place? 
This Python script helps you to download and prepare the content to upload to MP3 player. It dowloads the latest set of *.pdf and *.mp3 files from BBC learning english site and updates MP3 tags for easy identification in mp3 player.
Required: 
 - Python 3.2
Uses:
 - id3 command line editor: http://freecode.com/projects/id3
 - mp3gain command line volume normalizer: http://mp3gain.sourceforge.net/
How to use:
 - run script under python 3.2 or higher version
 - *.pdf and *.mp3 files will be located in new created directory named like bbc_learn_[Year]_[Month]_[Day]
